title: POLITICS WITOUT GUARANTEES with Jacob T. Levy
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: In the second part of my conversation with professor Jacob T. Levy we look at the need people have for guarantees in their political and moral systems; guarantees that their will of the world will both be actualized and be morally correct.  We ask what the world looks like in the absence of such certainty.
itunes:subtitle: In the second part of my conversation with profesâ€¦
description: In the second part of my conversation with professor Jacob T. Levy we look at the need people have for guarantees in their political and moral systems; guarantees that their will of the world will both be actualized and be morally correct.
